name: Astri
description: The Astri is a small celestial being with a whimsical nature, featuring an exceptional Dexterity and a vibrant appearance characteristic of chaotic good entities.
memorable: Its ability to enforce good deeds upon those it assists and its multiple support capabilities make the Astri a memorable ally in any situation.
goals: The Astri aims to aid others and inspire acts of kindness and charity.
relations: It may be encountered with other celestial beings or creatures that embody good and altruism.
environment: Typically found in areas of light or goodness, or where help is needed.
strengths: Resistant to damage from nonmagical attacks and immune to charm and exhaustion.
weaknesses: Relatively average strength, which may limit its physical capabilities in combat.
attacks: Multiattack consisting of three magical bite attacks, dealing both piercing and radiant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Enforce Good Deeds, compelling assisted creatures to perform altruistic actions for up to 30 days.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 90 feet and a passive perception of 16.
skills: Highly skilled in stealth and survival, taking advantage of its Dexterity to remain undetected.
additional_information: Can provide assistance as a bonus action, enhancing combat capabilities.
Innate spellcasting abilities allow it to cast useful spells without components.
Healing Touch ability can restore hit points and cure various conditions.
Magic Resistance grants it advantage on saving throws against spells.
Defensive Counter allows punishment of attackers targeting its allies.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster using Charisma, capable of casting spells for healing, utility, and support.
